thread.title: Michigan lawmakers weigh discipline for pair in sex scandal - San Jose Mercury News
thread.title_full: Michigan lawmakers weigh discipline for pair in sex scandal - San Jose Mercury News - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: San Jose Mercury News
title: Michigan lawmakers weigh discipline for pair in sex scandal - San Jose Mercury News
text:
Two freshmen tea party lawmakers who set out to shake up Michigan's Capitol succeeded in a way no one could have imagined. On Tuesday, the state House will hold a rare disciplinary hearing that could lead to the expulsion of Reps.
 San Jose Mercury News.
